head.title: Paid Notice: Deaths CIRKER, STANLEY S.

hedline.hl1: Paid Notice: Deaths CIRKER, STANLEY S.

block.p: CIRKER--Stanley S. The entire Peninsula Hospital Center family is deeply saddened by the passing of cherished benefactor and dear friend Stanley S. Cirker Esq., Senior Vice Chairman, Board of Directors. His gracious, affable and distinguished presence as well as his devoted dedication to the Hospital Center's mission will be missed by all. Staff & Board of Directors Peninsula Hospital Center
